channel.title: Pro coders look here!
channel.description:
well heres the thing.
in my sprite file (client side) i have a cool admin icon and i want that icon to show up when i say something on the game (you know like how the normal gold admin sign shows up when you say something, thats if ure admin)
can anyone help me please !! :confused:
